items.title: Birthday Party Decoration (kids, adults, theme-based)
items.description: Theme-based birthday decorations with balloons, backdrops, props and table setups. Suitable for homes and small venues.

items.title: Anniversary Decoration
items.description: Romantic anniversary setups with floral arrangements, lighting and personalized props.

items.title: Surprise Room Decoration
items.description: Quick surprise room decorators for home celebrations with balloons and fairy lights.

items.title: Wedding Mandap Decoration
items.description: Traditional or contemporary mandap decorations using florals, drapes and lighting, tailored to the theme.

items.title: Sangeet Stage & Dance Floor Decoration
items.description: Stage, lighting and dance floor dressing for energetic sangeet nights.

items.title: Balloon Decoration (helium, LED, printed, metallic, confetti)
items.description: Full range of balloon setups including arches, clusters and LED installations.
